servinfo.title: P/S Fluid Leakage Check
servinfo.ptxt: Start engine and turn steering wheel fully to the right and left so that maximum hydraulic pressure is provided.
Then visually check P/S gear case assembly (1), P/S pump (2) and P/S fluid reservoir (3) themselves and each joint of their connecting pipes for leakage.

attention2.ptxt: Never keep steering wheel turned fully for longer than 10 seconds.
